TopicTitle: FanWork Fridays: A Surprise at Shapeways

Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/301cb0bc17ca76a396dc75e2651dee4d/tumblr_inline_n74ubzlBiw1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/72a1fce27edc4b5c0e7c90eb55556e7e/tumblr_inline_n74ucok7LX1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p>This might be a loose definition of a fanwork, but for anyone who’s ever scribbled a funny face onto a wall, this one’s for you. @mitchelljetten recently visited the Shapeways office and found this one someone’s desk. This looks like an evil Kerbal to us. What do you think?</p>

<p></p>
LOL! Did you guys make this..... i have a feeling you did.
"BOB! Where the HELL are my boosters?!?"
Well...I won`t like to meet THAT Kerbal at night...
He's only mad because his launch was scrubbed. "I know it doesn't have enough fuel to get back! What does that have to do with anything?"
That's Jeb's mirror universe twin. Or just his evil twin, Bej. Maybe both combined in some horrible genetic experiment. Just needs a goatee beard.

He is not evil, he just thought "landing gears ? where is the buttonnnnn !!!!!" while altimeter's needle turns like hell .

Or "nnnnoooooooooo I forgot to add chutes !!!! AGAAAAIIIINNNNNNNNNNNNN :sticktongue:"
"I will press this button and DESTROY SCOTT MANLEY'S ROCKET! Nothing can stop me! MWUAHAHAHA!"
